channel.title: Comments on: Generating DataSet Definition for ASP.net Client Reports from C#
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.content:encoded:
You got me, I did write this because I was tired of fielding questions on how the datasets need to be defined (I get the joy of being our friendly neighborhood SSRS “expert”).

Please don’t tell anyone about my despicable laziness. I promise its’ the only trait I share with these good programmers you speak of ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: chaospandion
item.dc:creator: chaospandion
item.description: The biggest difference between a good programmer and a bad programmer is that a good programmer gets the same results doing less work.
item.content:encoded: The biggest difference between a good programmer and a bad programmer is that a good programmer gets the same results doing less work.
